name: ＠Solitaire
description:
Smooth and fun solitaire!

Highlights:
- Fun Animations
- Smooth Experience
- Succinct UI
- Varied Themes

Solitaire is a great puzzle game and everyone should install one.

If you like to play with the classic solitaire on PC, you will also like to enjoy this Solitaire.

This solitaire keeps the most classic play, and add a variety of elements such as the daily challenge, various themes, funny victory animations,state saving at any time, and so on.
